{{short description|Seventh chairman of the Tolkien Society}}
'''Chris Crawshaw''' was the seventh Chairman of [[The Tolkien Society]]. Serving for nearly 12 years from [[21 April]] [[1996]] until [[19 April]] [[2008]], Crawshaw is the Society's second longest-serving Chairman. During her chairmanship, Crawshaw oversaw the large [[Tolkien 2005]] event and the expansion in the Society's membership following the release of ''[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|The Lord of the Rings]]'' films.
